content: pattern is free when you sign up for the creative crochet corner newsletter 1 **this pattern was featured in a live creative crochet corner event you can watch the how-to video that goes along with this pattern over here on the creative crochet corner website 2 it is free to all ** inspired by quiet christmastime memories watching the snow fall outside my living room window this tree skirt evokes a calm cozy version of the winter holiday season the tree skirt is worked in turned row from the center out puff stitches are sprinkled throughout a background of simple single_crochet stitches the cabled pine tree stitch pattern is simpler than it looks and makes for a fun ending to this large project 1 http //go creativecrochetcorner com/a33066/ 2 https //www creativecrochetcorner com/video/silent-night-christmas-tree-skirt/
